channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle -- FLEXCUBE Core Banking
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle -- FLEXCUBE Core Banking

item.title: CVE-2016-8314|2024-08-06T02:20:30.115Z -- oracle -- flexcube%20core%20banking
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking component of Oracle Financial Services Applications (subcomponent: Core). Supported versions that are affected are 5.1.0, 5.2.0 and 11.5.0. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking accessible data. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 3.1 (Confidentiality impacts).

item.title: CVE-2016-8323|2024-08-06T02:20:30.664Z -- oracle -- flexcube%20core%20banking
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking component of Oracle Financial Services Applications (subcomponent: Core). Supported versions that are affected are 5.1.0, 5.2.0 and 11.5.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking accessible data as well as unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking accessible data. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 5.4 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts).

item.title: CVE-2016-8322|2024-08-06T02:20:30.489Z -- oracle -- flexcube%20core%20banking
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking component of Oracle Financial Services Applications (subcomponent: Core). Supported versions that are affected are 5.1.0, 5.2.0 and 11.5.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking accessible data. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts).

item.title: CVE-2016-8324|2024-08-06T02:20:30.719Z -- oracle -- flexcube%20core%20banking
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking component of Oracle Financial Services Applications (subcomponent: Core). Supported versions that are affected are 5.1.0, 5.2.0 and 11.5.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle FLEXCUBE Core Banking accessible data. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts).
